description: This file implements a React context provider for managing a shopping cart in an e-commerce application. It includes state management for cart items, functions to add, remove, update, and clear items, and localStorage persistence. It also provides a hook for consuming the cart context.

methods.name: CartProvider
methods.description: React component providing cart context to children, manages cart state with persistence.

methods.name: useCart
methods.description: Custom hook to access the cart context; throws error if used outside provider.
